tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had consulted Dr Preethi throughout the period of my wife's pregnancy. An extremely able hand and a no nonsense doctor. Having said that, she was always available when we needed. Always tries for a normal delivery. I definitely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We had visited Dr. Pretty on an emergency basis in the OPD of Apollo Hospital,  Bannerghatta Road for urine retention . She had diagnosed a big sized fibroid and carried a myomectomy successfully . Following this we had approached her for our pregnancy .  During urine routine tests slight urine infection was detected . Most of the visits she would recommend a urine test and prescribe medicine . ***** ******* **** ***** ******* ************ ****  * She did try her level best to treat the issue *** ******** ******* ** * I had to be hospitalized for sometime *** *** ******* ******** * Though she had put me on **** medication but our faith and aspirations could not withstand the test of time . 
Our mental stress led us to reach for a second opinion from another ****** *** *********** gynecologist and obstetrician . ***** * ** **** ******** *** ***** ** *** ******** ** *** *** ***** ******** ******* * ** ***** ***** ** **** **** ********* *** ******** *** *** ********* ******* ************* **** ******** ******* ** * **** ***** ***** *

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I don't recommend this doctor. She is very rude. I went for my urinary infection and I also had irregular  periods. And she had no patience to listen to what was the history of my health. It was over all very bad experience. And it's repeating in Apollo Hospital with many doctors. M really disappointed. She made me sleep on bed and pressed my tummy in fraction of second she told get down now, that too so rudely. And told some tests *** *** ******* ****** may be you have this disorder that problem and all.

tags: None
review: **** ****** ***** ** ***** ****** * **** **** ***.. She finished my consultation within 2mins. She did not ask anything about my previous medical history just prescribed  a tablet and asked me to meet her aft a couple of tests.. Never understood what my problem is. I strongly do not recommend her. Think twice before consulting her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Medical Termination Of Pregnancy (Mtp),
review:
We visited to check my wife pregnancy.
Doctor was not friendly she will explain things like questions to answers.
She will not give any best suggestions...
She will say her procedures..
If u want u can come other wise you can goto other doctors...like this way she will explain.
We feel if she would have more friendliness and suggestive manner then it would be good.
After that your wish üôÅ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: not at all friendly. Do avoid if you need a friendly, comforting doc. No patience at all to listen.. just want us to pay and leave asap.Highly not recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: very rude doctor. **** *** ** *** **** *** ** **** ** ******** I will not recommend this doctor to anyone. she was not at all listening to us. Negative rating from me

review: Seems very strict ,, I have PCOS according to scanning report, **** *** *** ******  *********** ** ***** think twice before consulting her

review: took so many tests ***** **** **** *** ***** ****** ******** *** not explained ******** what problem I am having. just telling do MRI, CT scan ***** *** *** ****** ****** ********** *** ****** ****** *** spent too much of money. very bad experience. never ever go.
